name: CyberFunk (Zamzam95, Kuba-Kachow)
description:
The evil and omnipotent Lord Funk rules the cyberspace with his evil Funkbots at his command. You have been chosen to infiltrate his cyber city and assassinate the heartless dictator! There is a catch however... Lord Funk is absolutely invincible. Even with all of your cyber skills and cyber courage, this is a suicide mission. Whatever will you do? There might be some way to 'bug' out his virtual world...

W - Move Forward

A - Move Left

S - Move Right

D - Move Backward

Left Mouse Button - Shoot 

Mouse - Move Camera

Programming and Testing - Zahid Mirza

Audio and Visuals - Jakub Kaczorek
